caption.title: Using the online front-end interface for HLB.
caption.p: Screenshots showing which parameters need to be changed in the front-end to recreate the analysis for the spread of HLB in a citrus grove (using the parameterisation presented by Parry et al. [ 26]) as described in S2 Text (a) epidemic parameters; (b) control parameters. The parameters that must be changed are highlighted in pink.
Click here for additional data file.
